title: Blood.and.Gold-The.Making.of.Spain-3Ep--BBC-2015-720p
description:
Blood and Gold: The Making of Spain with Simon Sebag Montefiore

Simon Sebag Montefiore embarks on a fascinating journey to unlock 2,000 years of Spain's history.

BBC (2015) - 3 episodes
 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b06rwgdf
______________________________________

1280x720 resolution - with subtitles - enjoy !
______________________________________

Conquest
Episode 1 of 3
In the first episode, Simon explores Spain's early years, its emergence as the battleground of empires and its golden age under the Cordoba Caliphate.

Reconquest
Episode 2 of 3
Simon uncovers the truth about Spain's hero El Cid. He also investigates the horror of the Spanish Inquisition and in the process discovers an unsettling story about one of his own ancestors.

Nation
Episode 3 of 3
Simon explores Spain's golden age under Philip II through to the Spanish Civil War and dictatorship under Franco, from which Spain has emerged as a modern democratic monarchy
